data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
data.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

data.author: Ayn Rand
data.quote: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.

data.author: Amanda Bynes
data.quote: People should find happiness in the little things, like family.

data.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estes
data.quote: Tears are a river that takes you somewhere…tears lift your boat off the ground, carrying it downriver to someplace better.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: You are the sky. Everything else – it’s just the weather.

data.author: L.M. Montgomery
data.quote: I’m so glad I live in a world where there are Octobers.
